any question.from sentence:
In order to answer any question , one must first retrieve the few relevant articles among more than 5 million items , and then scan them carefully to identify the answer .
We term this setting , machine reading at scale ( MRS ) .

Wikipedia.from sentence: Our work treats Wikipedia as a collection of articles and does not rely on its internal graph structure .

could be.from sentence: As a result , our approach is generic and could be switched to other collections of documents , books , or even daily updated newspapers .

single knowledge source.from sentence: Having a single knowledge source forces the model to be very precise while searching for an answer as the evidence might appear only once .
